description: * [ ] **Homework Review** * [ ] **Tools on Tuesday**   * [ ] **[Vue JS](http://vuejs.org)**     * `bower install --save vue`     * `wiredep -s index.html`     * [ ] build [_The Colour Clock_](http://thecolourclock.co.uk)     * [ ] build Github Profile   * [ ] **[Sass](http://sass-lang.com)**     * `npm install -g node-sass`     * `git mv css/main.css css/main.scss`     * refactor: nested selectors     * `node-sass css/main.scss`     * magic * **Enjoy the Vue**
